ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_women] Question Me This . . .
ygData.msgSnippet: Salutations Tyhana! That was a nice story and kind of neat and I certainly hope things continue to work out for you as well as they are now or even better. ...
ygData.messageBody:
Salutations Tyhana!

That was a nice story and kind of neat and I certainly
hope things continue to work out for you as well as
they are now or even better.
:o)

You just never know what might happen I guess,I've
heard about people who met their special someone on EQ
but your the first I've actually met.

:o)
Brangvyne

--- S S <saphirz@...> wrote:
> Hi I have a story about marrage and eq, My cleric
> met an enchanter at lvl 17 while grouping in oasis,
> we got talking and after a few nights realized we
> had alot in common as real life ppl. We were married
> in game at the little dock in nro at sunset that
> takes you to IC when we
> made lvl 20 and that was about a 1 1/2 ago. We
> spent almost every night eather grped or we would
> talk in game, after about a month we started talking
> over the phone, slowly our friendship grew in the
> real world.
> The only problem was he was on the other side of the
> US from me so it was limited to just talking on the
> phone, the feelings for each other grew and we found
> we had we had fell in love for real. we wanted to
> meet but at that time it wasnt a thing we could do.
> we continued to talk daily on eq and on the phone
> for about a year. We then started to talk using
> netmeeting and did that for a few months. We started
> both feeling
> of wanting to be togeather very strongly. we then
> started making plans for him to come down so we
> could meet for real. This last July he spent 3 weeks
> here wiht me. we had so much fun and both of us
> realized how much we loved being with each other.
> We both realized how hard it was going to be for him
> to go back home. We talked about him moving here.
> At the end of aug he moved him self down here to
> move in with me.
> We are very happy togeather and cant imagine what it
> would be to be wiht one an other now. He is a very
> loving person and im very happy and feel very luck
> to have found him. The odds of us meeting in game
> are huge and the odds of us grping in the same grp
> that night are even bigger. So we feel it was
> totally ment to be.
> So see wonderful things can happen from playing a
> game and ingame marrage.
> so i guess that is my answer about getting married
> in the game.
> Tyhana Storm
> 55 cleric
> Bertoxx
>
> Ps my cleric as preformed a few marrages now also
> and those ppl are still very happy with there
> partner in the game.
>
